title: Boeing finds two serious problems with Starliner just weeks before launch
description: "Safety is always our top priority, and that drives this decision."

title: Motorola makes its 4th-gen foldable, the Moto Razr+, official
description: And a second low-end model promises to be the cheapest foldable on the market.

title: Dangerous brain abscesses spiked in US kids as COVID restrictions dropped
description: Cases are on the decline, but still above baseline rates.

title: NASA panel: No convincing evidence for extraterrestrial life connected with UAPs
description: Amid ambiguity and poor data, "We don't know exactly what we're looking for."

title: Pentagon buying Starlink dishes for Ukraine after funding dispute with SpaceX
description: DoD confirms deal months after Musk said he'd "keep funding Ukraine for free."

title: Google Assistant kills off support for third-party note apps
description: The Google Assistant continues to circle the drain, with yet another feature loss.

title: Meta beats Apple to the mixed-reality punch with $499 Quest 3 coming this fall
description: Quest 2's starting price is also going back down to $299.

title: FTC: Amazon/Ring workers illegally spied on users of home security cameras
description: Amazon agrees to Ring and Alexa settlements but didn't admit violating any laws.

title: “Clickless” iOS exploits infect Kaspersky iPhones with never-before-seen malware
description: "Operation Triangulation" stole mic recordings, photos, geolocation, and more.

title: Asus will offer local ChatGPT-style AI servers for office use
description: "AFS Appliance" will avoid the cloud and place an AI language model on premises.

title: Apple reportedly prepping a pair of high-end Mac desktops ahead of WWDC
description: A new Mac Studio is more likely than the long-awaited Apple Silicon Mac Pro.

title: Players replace Tears of the Kingdom’s patched-out item-dupe glitches
description: Please, Nintendo, just leave them alone this time.

title: Researchers get primate embryos to start organ development in culture dishes
description: The start of organ development can help us understand human developmental problems.

title: Toyota to build electric 3-row SUV in Kentucky, batteries in N. Carolina
description: After ignoring EVs for too long, Toyota now spending billions to build them here.

title: The Atlantic hurricane season has begun: What we know and what we don’t
description: A little bit of preparation now will go a long way when a storm threatens.

title: Millions of PC motherboards were sold with a firmware backdoor
description: Hidden code in many Gigabyte motherboards invisibly and insecurely downloads programs.

title: Ars Frontiers recap: What happens to developers when AI can code?
description: Computers won't put us all out of a job—not yet, at least.

title: The “death of self-driving cars” has been greatly exaggerated
description: GM’s Cruise aims to turn self-driving into a billion-dollar business.
